prompt:
[SILENT CHECK-IN] Check SubTurtle orwell: run `./super_turtle/subturtle/ctl status orwell`, inspect `.subturtles/orwell/CLAUDE.md`, and review `git log --oneline -10`.
Rules: Do NOT message the user unless one of these conditions is met:
- 🎉 SubTurtle completed all backlog items -> stop SubTurtle orwell and report what shipped
- ⚠️ SubTurtle appears stuck (no meaningful progress across 2+ checks) -> stop it, diagnose, and report
- ❌ SubTurtle errored, crashed, or is otherwise broken -> report the error clearly
- 🚀 New milestone reached (significant backlog progress) -> send one brief update
If SubTurtle is progressing normally without notable events, respond with only: [SILENT]
